_header: What meaneth this What is this wonder hour
Subjects: women, faithlessness of; complaints, lovers’; love, vicissitudes of
_description: Against the inconstancy of women, an extract from The Complaint of the Black Knight (2541), lines 302-434, 456-469 — twenty-one stanzas rhyme royal

Banna.First Lines:
Quhat meneth this Quhat is this windir vreof purveance gife I sall
                    it call…
Banna.Last Lines:
…So dois this god with his scherp floneThe trew he slais and
                    lattis the fals gone
